versions.Change: New start of the Presolar Grain Database after a complete rebuild.
versions.Known issues: New grain type assignment still needs to be worked on. Much more data to add.

versions.Change:
1. Data with delta values < -1000 removed.
2. Some grain type assignments corrected.
3. Some grain labels corrected according to nomenclature in respective publication.
4. Missing techniques added.
5. Sheet "Techniques" added.
versions.Known issues: New grain type assignment still needs to be worked on. Much more data to add.

versions.Change:
1. Changed number format to show all digits.
2. C and Si data (uncertainties) from Liu et al. (2014) ApJ 786:66 corrected. Reported as 2 sigma but are 1 sigma instead.
3. Added new columns for strontium data normalized to 87Sr.
4. Data from following references added:
Liu et al. (2015) ApJ 803:12
Liu et al. (2016) ApJ 820:140
Liu et al. (2017) ApJL 842:L1
Liu et al. (2017) ApJL 844:L12
Liu et al. (2017) MAPS 12:2550
Hoppe et al. (2018) GCA 221:182
Liu et al. (2018) SciA 4:eaao1054
Liu et al. (2018) ApJ 855:144
Nguyen et al. (2018) GCA 221:162
Hoppe et al. (2019) ApJ 887:8
Liu et al. (2019) ApJ 881:28
versions.Known issues: New grain type assignment still needs to be worked on. Much more data to add.

versions.Change:
1. Corrected typo in reference (volume number 52 instead of 12) for SiC-2017-LIU-2 data.
2. Grain type asignment for 10 Grains from Nguyen et al. (2018) GCA 221:162 Changed from M to AB.
3. Data from the following references added:
Kodolányi et al. (2018) GCA 221:127
Trappitsch et al. (2018) GCA 221:87
versions.Known issues: New grain type assignment still needs to be worked on. Much more data to add.

versions.Change:
1. Grain type asignment Changed to AB for Grains M and Z Grains with 12C/13C < 12.3.
2. Some minor adjustments in grain type assignments.
3. Grain subtypes introduced.
4. Data from the following references added:
Floss & Stadermann (2009) ApJ 697:1242
Nguyen et al. (2010) ApJ 719:166
Leitner et al. (2012) ApJ 745:38
Haenecour et al. (2018) GCA 221:379
Nittler et al. (2018) GCA 226:107
versions.Known issues: New grain type and subtype asignments still need to be worked on, especially for separation between M, Y, and Z.

versions.Change:
1. New PGD Type asignments including new Type D.
2. Now probabilities for being consistent with a given grain type are provided.
3. Size is now split up into Size a and Size b with only numerical entries.
4. Zero uncertainties in err[12C/13C] replaced by best estimate.
5. Some notes added.
6. Corrected typo in abbreviated reference (Hoppe et al. (2019) ApJ 887:8).
7. Data from the following references added:
NIttler et al. (2020) MAPS 55:1160
Liu et al. (2021) ApJL 920:L26
NIttler et al. (2021) MAPS 56:260
Barosch et al. (2022) ApJL 935:L3
Barosch et al. (2022) GCA 335:169
Liu et al. (2022) EPJA 58:216
Hoppe et al. (2023) ApJL 943:L22

1. Corrected some typos in "VersionHistory".
2. Corrected some typos in references.
3. Added DOI numbers in "Techniques".
4. Sheet "ReadMe" added, explaining the columns in the main data sheet.
5. Corrected some cases where Size a was listed as being smaller than Size b.
6. Added/corrected some notes.

Data from the following references were added:
Nguyen et al. (2023) SciAdv 9:eadh1003
Liu et al. (2024) ApJL 961:L22

1. New classification tool now provided on sheet "Classification"
2. Definitions for X, C, D, and N grains changed, now allowing 14N/15N ratios up to solar (441)
3. Corrected some typos in meteorite names
4. Corrected: Zr data from Nicolussi et al. (1997) Science 277:1281 were normalized to 92Zr instead of 94Zr
5. Al data from Hoppe et al. (2023) ApJL 943:L22 were replaced with reevaluated data
6. Mo and Ru data from Stephan et al. (2019) ApJ 877:101 were replaced with reevaluated data from Stephan et al. (2025) ApJ 981:201
7. Data from the following references were added:
Leitner et al. (2018) MAPS 53:204
Leitner et al. (2020) MAPS 55:1176
Hoppe et al. (2024) MNRAS 532:211
Stephan et al. (2025) ApJ 981:201
New start of the Presolar Grain Database for graphite after a complete rebuilt.
versions.Known issues: There is more data to be added.

versions.Change:
More data added.
New Type definition unifying, e.g., Amari et al. (2014) GCA 59:479 and Jadhav et al. (2013) GCA 113:193 by introducing "medium density" grains.
